title: Understanding Psychotropic Classifications
text: Psychotropic medications are used to treat various mental health conditions. They are categorized based on their primary effects on the brain and behavior.

title: Common Types of Psychotropics
text: Consider the different types of medications used to treat mental health disorders such as depression, anxiety, and schizophrenia.

hintAnswer: antipsychotics, antidepressants, mood stabilizers, anxiolytics, hypnotics, and stimulants
